comment: Probably one of the best teachers I've had in college so far. The class is fun, work load minimal, attendance not enforced. Take her class if you need to take sociology or if you dont take it anyway.

LOVE HER!! You can talk about anything and everything! You can type up 10 multiple choice questions about the material as extra credit. Then she addes all the students questions as your study guide and those exact questions are the 2 tests. 1 5 pg. paper (start early she will edit it). Every class was a group discussion about taboo subjects! EASY A

There are not very many grades, so you have to do good on everything. The tests aren't too hard if you study. She posts class outlines online but she gives details in class so it is good to attend. There is a lot of discussion about the topics so it makes the class a little more interesting than most.

awesome prof! 3 tests, 1 pretty tough paper but she will help you through it. all the tests are are questions that we submit for extra credit that she puts into a study guide - almost word for word, so the tests are pretty easy! attendance is not mandatory. she has a great personality and the subject matter is actually pretty interesting. take her!
Wachniak is straight gangsta!! A personality you will not soon forget. She makes you flex your brain muscles.

She is the QUEEN!! I would have to say that she is fair and more than willing to help students. Her personality is just perfect and the humor is just an added bonus. You'll get the good grade IF you try-she is very helpful so it should not be too hard.
